body_html: I see. Since the forward function is written by yourself, I don't see how PyTorch can simply know how to truncate the model. In this case, could you use a flag on the model that determines whether it goes to upsampling route or pool+linear route after bottleneck? If you want to free up the GPU memory used by the upsampling route, you can use delattr.
